spring.name: Blue Jazz
spring.description: The flower grows in a sphere to invite as many butterflies as possible.

spring.name: Carrot
spring.description: A fast-growing, colorful tuber that makes for a great snack.

spring.name: Cauliflower
spring.description: Valuable, but slow-growing. Despite its pale color, the florets are packed with nutrients.

spring.name: Coffee Bean
spring.description: Plant in spring or summer to grow a coffee plant. Place five beans in a keg to make coffee.

spring.name: Garlic
spring.description: Adds a wonderful zestiness to dishes. High quality garlic can be pretty spicy.

spring.name: Green Bean
spring.description: A juicy little bean with a cool, crisp snap.

spring.name: Kale
spring.description: The waxy leaves are great in soups and stir fries.

spring.name: Parsnip
spring.description: A spring tuber closely related to the carrot. It has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.

spring.name: Rhubarb
spring.description: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.

spring.name: Strawberry
spring.description: A sweet, juicy favorite with an appealing red color.

spring.name: Tulip
spring.description: The most popular spring flower. Has a very faint sweet smell.

spring.name: Unmilled Rice
spring.description: Rice in its rawest form. Run this through a mill to increase the value.
